welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Playa del Carmen, where the stunning beaches, vibrant nightlife, and rich Mayan culture await you. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that this charming city has to offer!"

restaurants.name: Kaxapa Factory
restaurants.description: Kaxapa Factory is a arepa restaurant located in Playa del Carmen.
restaurants.address: Calle 10 Norte (Entre Av 15 y 20), 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo

restaurants.name: El Doctorcito
restaurants.description: El Doctorcito is a seafood restaurant located in Playa del Carmen.
restaurants.address: Ave. 25 Norte esquina Calle 12, 77715 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo

restaurants.name: Bovino's
restaurants.description: Bovino's is a brazilian restaurant located in Playa del Carmen.
restaurants.address: Avenida 10 esquina con Calle 12 (Calle 12), Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo

restaurants.name: El Fogón Fiesta Jarocha
restaurants.description: El Fogón Fiesta Jarocha is a taco restaurant located in Playa del Carmen.
restaurants.address: Av. 30 (Calle 6 Bis), 77710 Playa Del Carmen, Quintana Roo

restaurants.name: La Senda
restaurants.description: La Senda is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Playa del Carmen.
restaurants.address: 10 avenida entre calles 10 y 10 bis, Col. CENTRO (!0 norte bis), Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
